title: Resolve a Shipping Error
description: A customer received the wrong product. A customer service rep needs to resolve the issue.

tasks.description: Log a new customer case for a 'shipping error'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new case in the CRM.

tasks.description: Arrange for the incorrect item to be picked up from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent issues an RMA and schedules a pickup.

tasks.description: Create a new sales order for the correct item to be expedited to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an expedited replacement order.
